===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A sugar-coated pill used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to dispel ''wind-cold'', remove obstruction from ''collateral channels'' and relieve pain in the treatment of rheumatic or rheumatoid arthritis with numbness of the limbs, general aching, limpness of the loins and knees and difficulty in walking".
